Klasse ExamScreenController

java.lang.Object
application.controller.Controller
application.controller.ExamScreenController
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Applicable<ExaminationPerformance>, Exitable
public class ExamScreenController extends Controller implements Exitable, Applicable<ExaminationPerformance>
Controller for the exam screen.

This controller manages the exam screen view and handles user interactions for creating or editing ExaminationPerformance models. It supports apply and cancel actions as well as model creation.

Extends Controller and implements:

  • Exitable
  • Applicable

      public ExamScreenController()
      Creates a new ExamScreenController. That means a new exam will be created.
